articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Andre Russell demolishes Azam Zampa as 'Russellmania' takes over Australia - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Andre Russell and Sherfane Rutherford played quick-fire knocks as West Indies crushed Australia in the 3rd T20I on Tuesday. | Cricket
articles.content: With Australia taking an unassailable 2-0 lead in the three-match Twenty20 series, the onus was on record-time T20 World Cup winners West Indies to salvage pride in the third encounter of the bilater… [+2616 chars]
